name: CabbyCat!
description:
AIM OF THE GAME: Pick up passengers from around the city and take them to their destinations! Try not to be late... or hit any buildings along the way.

(If you do hit a few odd buildings, doing a little hop over a traffic cone can sometimes assuage your passenger's temper.)

Once you safely deliver them to their destination,  they will pay you in FISH based on how happy they are with your service. A 3 FISH TIP is a perfect score! 8 FISH total will win you the game.

CONTROLS: Use the MOUSE and SPACEBAR to control your vehicle. LMB will accelerate, RMB will slow down for a moment, and SPACEBAR will make you do a little hop!

ALSO: R will Reset the game, F will toggle Fullscreen mode, and ESC will end the program. (X does something too.)

---

Made for Mini Jam 80: Cats! (Limitation: 8x8 textures. All textures are 8x8, and the car/cat object is composed of an 8x8 sprite's 8-frames, spread across a fake "z" axis instead of time.)

All visual assets were made by me, with Music generated with Wolfram Tones and SFX created with BFXR.

Known Issues: I thought I had the collisions worked out, but there are still some random clipping issues with some of the buildings. Press "R" to reset if you ever  get stuck.

---

Cheers, everyone! Enjoy, post your best time, and let me know what you think!
